    • createConnection

      public void createConnection​(java.lang.String serverIP, int serverPort) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets up a connection between the client and this GUIManager instance
      Parameters:
      serverIP - is the ip of Santorini's server, selected by the client
      serverPort - is the port of Santorini's server, selected by the client
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the name/port are illegal values

      Type Parameters:
      MediaPlayer -
      Parameters:
